pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api

Interface ConnectionStateListener<T extends UserContext>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDisconnectedListener

    public interface ConnectionStateListener<T extends UserContext>
    This interface is meant to be implemented by application creator to handle user connection and disconnection events. There can be multiple connection state listeners defined, they are run by ConnectionStateListenerChain. Listener methods are parametrized with base type of UserContext. In all cases, actual user context implementation (according to UserFactory used in application) is passed, listeners may be parametrized with custom user implementations so they won't be forced to use casting. The order of connection state listeners execution can be set using Spring Framework Order annotation.

    Created on: 2011-11-20 14:47:18

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void userConnected(T userContext, ConnectionStateListenerChain connectionStateListenerChain)
      Method invoked after connection with given user is established.
      void userDisconnected(T userContext, ConnectionStateListenerChain connectionStateListenerChain)
      Method invoked after connection with given user is closed.

    • Method Detail

      • userConnected

        void userConnected(T userContext,
                 ConnectionStateListenerChain connectionStateListenerChain)
        Method invoked after connection with given user is established.
        Parameters:
        userContext - connected user.
        connectionStateListenerChain - connection state listener chain.

      • userDisconnected

        void userDisconnected(T userContext,
                    ConnectionStateListenerChain connectionStateListenerChain)
        Method invoked after connection with given user is closed. In addition, user doesn't exists in users container and cannot receive any further messages.
        Parameters:
        userContext - disconnected user.
        connectionStateListenerChain - connection state listener chain.
